mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Expired_Food WHERE Food_no = #{Food_no}
mapper.sql: Food_no, Food_type, Food_name, Expired_date, Loss_num, Loss_money, Processing_method
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from Expired_Food where flag=0
order by ${orderByClause}
select Food_no from Expired_Food order by Food_no desc limit 1
select count(*) from Expired_Food where flag=0

select
from Expired_Food where Food_no = #{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0

select * from Expired_Food where flag=0 and to_days(Expired_date) = to_days(#{Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and Food_name like '%${Food_name}%' and Food_type like '%${Food_type}%' and Food_no like '%${Food_no}%' order by Expired_date desc
select * from Expired_Food where flag=0 and Food_name like '%${Food_name}%' and Food_type like '%${Food_type}%' and Food_no like '%${Food_no}%' order by Expired_date desc
select * from Expired_Food where flag=0 order by Expired_date desc
select * from Expired_Food where flag=0 order by Loss_num desc
select * from Expired_Food where flag=0 order by Loss_money desc
select * from Expired_Food where Food_type = '原料' and flag=0 order by Expired_date desc
select * from Expired_Food where Food_type = '成品' and flag=0 order by Expired_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into Expired_Food (Food_no, Food_type, Food_name, Expired_date, Loss_num, Loss_money, Processing_method) values (#{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Food_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Food_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{Loss_num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{Loss_money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{Processing_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into Expired_Food
Food_no,
Food_type,
Food_name,
Expired_date,
Loss_num,
Loss_money,
Processing_method,
#{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{Food_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update Expired_Food
Food_no = #{record.Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Food_type = #{record.Food_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Food_name = #{record.Food_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Expired_date = #{record.Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Loss_num = #{record.Loss_num,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Loss_money = #{record.Loss_money,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Processing_method = #{record.Processing_method,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update Expired_Food set Food_no = #{record.Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Food_type = #{record.Food_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Food_name = #{record.Food_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Expired_date = #{record.Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Loss_num = #{record.Loss_num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Loss_money = #{record.Loss_money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Processing_method = #{record.Processing_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Expired_Food
Food_no = #{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Food_type = #{Food_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Food_name = #{Food_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Expired_date = #{Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Loss_num = #{Loss_num,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Loss_money = #{Loss_money,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Processing_method = #{Processing_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Food_no = #{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Expired_Food set Food_no = #{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Food_type = #{Food_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Food_name = #{Food_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Expired_date = #{Expired_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Loss_num = #{Loss_num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Loss_money = #{Loss_money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Processing_method = #{Processing_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Food_no = #{Food_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
